channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 College Football Rankings: Indiana, Texas Tech Jump After Conference Title Wins
item.description: FOX Sports' RJ Young reveals his final Top 25 rankings after Week 15, with Big Ten winner Indiana on top and ACC champ Duke rounding it out.

item.title: 2025 CFP Title Odds: Ohio State Remains Favored After Loss to Indiana
item.description: See the latest CFP title odds, now that the conference title games are completed and No. 1 OSU went down.

item.title: Indiana's Curt Cignetti After Big Ten Title: Top Seed 'Only Counts If You Finish' It
item.description: Cignetti's Hoosiers made history against Ohio State on Saturday night, and will have the chance to do it again as the No. 1 seed in the College Footba...

item.title: 2025 Heisman Trophy Odds: Mendoza Becomes Heavy Favorite After Win Over Ohio State
item.description: One Big Ten quarterback has become a near lock to win the award after a historic win. Here are the latest odds.

item.title: What Game is Tom Brady Calling Today? Week 14 Schedule
item.description: Find out what game is Tom Brady calling this week including the full 2025 season schedule.

item.title: How the U.S. matches up against group stage foes
item.description: Who is the USMNT set to play next summer and how will it match up? ESPN breaks it all down.

item.title: Champ Week: A new No. 1, Bama jeopardy, ACC chaos
item.description: Tracking the Power 4 conference title games and discussing what the results mean for the CFP.

item.title: 2026 men's World Cup predictions: Group by group takeaways, must-see games
item.description: The draw is complete for the 2026 World Cup! What are the top matches to watch, and how will it all go down? We asked ESPN's writers to break down eac...

item.title: Yan's and Van's wins at UFC 323 throw kinks into the MMA timeline
item.description: It's easy to think about what could have been as Petr Yan and Joshua Van become champions.

item.title: Miami's first MLS Cup title caps off a long, ambitious project
item.description: A season that started with doubts ends in triumph as Lionel Messi helps steer Inter Miami to their first MLS Cup title.
